name: Star Crash
overview: As captain of a strategic space station patrolling on the fringes of the galaxy, life can be pretty dull. Usually the cryogenic chamber is set to defrost only once every 10 years, but this time the RB-130 onboard computer has detected an alien battle fleet heading towards Federation territory. Your object is to destroy as many aliens as possible before you finally run out of power. Though your fate is to die far from home, you must do your best to defend the men, women and robots of the Federation so that they may live on.
